name: App store template - App icon & Store screens (v1.04)
description:
App store template - Contains a template for creating app icons for ios platforms and a template for creating screenshots for the appstore. This is a multifunctional template that will speed up your work when creating content for publishing an application. The template also contains appstore layouts for previewing your created images for the appstore.


How to use your icons and screenshots in the AppStore preview?

  1. If you are working in a previously formed frame (name: app icon), the app icon will be automatically inserted into the preview layout of the appstore.
  2. To test screenshots, you need to export your screenshots to an image and add them to the location of your pictures in the preview layout of the store.
